question: What is the aim of the TRAP method?
ideal_answer: The translating ribosome affinity purification (TRAP) method is used to obtain obtain translatome data.

snippets.text: In this article, we give hands-on instructions to obtain translatome data from different Arabidopsis thaliana root cell types via the translating ribosome affinity purification (TRAP) method
Using translating ribosome affinity purification (TRAP) method to isolate CA3 translating mRNAs,
we describe the use of the Translating Ribosome Affinity Purification (TRAP) method for C. elegans to detect cell type-specific gene expression patterns at the level of translating mRNAs.
